strings.string: Jeu d'énigme
Cette pierre semble pouvoir se briser.
Allez ! On utilise EclatRock !
Allez ! On utilise Force !
Mais il semble manquer un objet...
Cette pierre semble pouvoir se déplacer.
Vous avez obtenu :
Cette pierre semble reliée à un signal, peut-être qu'en trouvant comment l'activer on peut la passer
Il parait que si tu as compris le sens de la vie, alors tu pourras passer
On dit qu'il faut savoir ce que l'on cherche pour pouvoir passer...le sais-tu ? Parce que moi pas vraiment...
Mew...mew, mew mew !
Hello I'm Alejandro. I'm in charge
of all your DAMAGE upgrades.
Don't listen to Tota, he's an idiot.
Hello I'm Tota. I'm in charge
of all your HEALTH upgrades,
that is if you can afford my services...
ALEJANDRO, WHAT ARE YOU DOING!!! I TOLD YOU TO CLEAN THIS ROOM, EVEYTHING IS A MESS
WHAT DO YOU MEAN, YOU TOLD ME NOT TO TOUCH ANY OF YOUR "PRECIOUS BELONGINGS"
Ah ouai, t'as raison...
ALEJANDRO, HOW MANY TIMES DID I TELL YOU NOT TO TOUCH MY PRECIOUS BELONGINGS!!!! YOU RUINED EVERYTHING.
YOU LITERALLY TOLD ME TO CLEAN UP SINCE "EVERYTHING IS A MESS"
hmmm... I don't remember
Would you like to upgrade your health ?
Would you like to upgrade your damage ?
It looks like you don't have enough coins
You now have more health
You are now stronger
Be careful of poison,
it can damage you even after getting hit
This land used to be very peaceful,
until He showed up...
I always hear Tota and Alejandro fighting,
they sound like an old married couple
Be careful when exploring the dungeons,
if your health ever gets low,
try consumig cherries and hearts,
I heard they help
Welcome to Beanos Dungeon !!!
This is your Village BozoTown
(press W to continue)
This town used to be very peaceful...
That is until the ultimate evil,
LORD BEANOS appeared and darkness
fell on this land...
To stop BEANOS and free this town
you first need to enter the portals
placed throughout this Town and beat them
the red dots indicate how many
more times you need to beat them to
unlock the next level
The portal to take you to BEANOS
is placed on the top right of BozoTown
and inside the left house is where Tota
and Alejandro live.
Interact with them to upgrade your
HEALTH and your DAMAGE
That is, if you have enough COINS
You can interact with the Villagers,
the portals and the house by pressing W
HAVE FUN !!!!
Your HEALTH is already MAXED !!!!
Your DAMAGE is already MAXED !!!!
W: YES X: NO
PRICE: 5 COINS
